Subjective: Sore throat x3 days. Fever this morning. Cough last week. Taken paracetamol and ibuprofen. Severe pain on swallowing. No shortness of breath, no runny nose. Concerns about abscess due to friend's experience.
Objective: Temperature: 38.3 C. Ears: Normal. Neck: Small submandibular lymph nodes. Throat: Red pharyngeal arch, enlarged tonsils with slough, no abscess. Lungs: Clear. Saturation: 98%.
Plan: Paracetamol 1000mg qid. Ibuprofen 400mg tid. Cold fluids/popsicles. Monitor for severe symptoms. No antibiotics indicated.
